chinese: 肌肉细胞将身体部分靠近。
english: Muscle cells bring parts of the body closer together.

chinese: 一系列关于经济学的讲座已经被记录下来。
english: A series of lectures showed us in economics have been recorded.

chinese: 需要延期的学生应该尽早申请。
english: Students requiring for an extension should apply sooner than later.

chinese: 今年的沉船毁坏了一些历史学家感兴趣的文物。
english: The shipwreck of this year ruined some artifacts which were interested by historians.

chinese: 大多数讲座都会准时开始，所以不要迟到。
english: Most of the lectures begin promptly, so do not be late.

chinese: 社会心理学关注于理解人类行为。
english: Social psychology is concerned with the understanding of human behaviors.

chinese: 一个笔记本电脑在生物实验室被发现了。
english: A laptop computer has been found in the biology lab.

chinese: 化学楼位于校园入口附近。
english: The chemistry building is located near the entrance to the campus.
